name: The Beatles: A Comprehensive Overview
description: Explore the history, members, and impact of The Beatles, one of the most iconic bands in music history.

flashcards.question: What year did The Beatles form?
Who were the original members?
flashcards.answer: John Lennon, Paul McCartney, George Harrison, Ringo Starr

flashcards.question: Which Beatles album is considered their magnum opus?
flashcards.answer: Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band

flashcards.question: What year did The Beatles disband?
What is the title of The Beatles' final studio album?
Who was the manager of The Beatles?
Which song is the most covered Beatles song?
Who was the first to leave The Beatles?
